alert.note: Alert for Coastal Camden; Coastal Glynn (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 5:12PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Camden and southeastern Glynn Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 512 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Little Saint Simons Island to near Jekyll Island. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... St. Simons Island, Jekyll Island and Sea Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
